body_html: @leezu nvcc will use the temp directory for intermediate compilation files. The way to avoid this is by setting environment variable TMPDIR to some other directory: http://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuda-compiler-driver-nvcc/index.html#keeping-intermediate-phase-files
body_text: @leezu nvcc will use the temp directory for intermediate compilation files. The way to avoid this is by setting environment variable TMPDIR to some other directory: http://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuda-compiler-driver-nvcc/index.html#keeping-intermediate-phase-files
body: @leezu `nvcc` will use the temp directory for intermediate compilation files. The way to avoid this is by setting environment variable `TMPDIR` to some other directory: http://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuda-compiler-driver-nvcc/index.html#keeping-intermediate-phase-files
